title: Maureen's apple tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '340g plain flour', 'pinch of salt', '150g butter, diced', '60g caster (or icing) sugar', 'For the apple filling', '4 or 5 cooking apples, peeled cored and sliced', '100g caster sugar', 'To glaze', '1 egg, beaten (for glazing)', 'caster sugar']
